data.message: Eminem,my friend and I really LOVE you and your music!!  I was wondering if you ever thought about letting a couple of your biggest fans come and stay with you for about a week or so! If you ever do decide to do that, let us be the first to volunteer, We dont take up much room and we clean up after ourselves...LOL....But seriously, we would love to hang out and party with you!  If your ever looking for a couple of midwestern girls to hang with give us a call!!
